typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TX_DATE as string,
		LOCATION_ID as long,
		ITEM_ID as long,
		REASON_CODE as string,
		DISPOSAL_METHOD_CODE as string,
		SCAN_CODE_ID as long,
		SHRINK_REASON as string,
		DISPOSAL_METHOD as string,
		RECALL_NUMBER as integer,
		SHRINK_UNITS as float,
		SHRINK_COST as float,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RetailKnownShrinkSRC
source(output(
		Location_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Store_Name as string,
		Current_Store_Name as string,
		Store_Number as integer,

		Current_Divisional_Regional_Rollup as string,
		Region_Name as string,
		Current_Region_Name as string,
		Region as integer,
		Current_Region as integer,
		Reporting_Region as string,
		Current_Reporting_Region as string,
		Ad_Group_Number as integer,
		Current_Ad_Group_Number as integer,
		Ad_Group_Name as string,
		Current_Ad_Group_Name as string,
		Ad_Group as string,
		Current_Ad_Group as string,
		Pricing_Group_Number as integer,
		Current_Pricing_Group_Number as integer,
		Pricing_Group_Name as string,
		Current_Pricing_Group_Name as string,
		Pricing_Group as string,
		Current_Pricing_Group as string,
		Same_Store as string,
		Current_Same_Store as string,
		Ecomm_Store as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Store as string,
		Alg_Store as string,
		Current_Alg_Store as string,
		Open_Store as string,
		Current_Open_Store as string,
		Open_Converted_Store as string,
		Current_Open_Converted_Store as string,
		Restaurant_Store as string,
		Current_Restaurant_Store as string,
		Coffee_Shop_Store as string,
		Current_Coffee_Shop_Store as string,
		Pharmacy_Store as string,
		Current_Pharmacy_Store as string,
		Store_Type as string,
		Current_Store_Type as string,
		Location_Type as string,
		Current_Location_Type as string,
		Location_Type_Description as string,
		Current_Location_Type_Description as string,
		Location_Group_Type as string,
		Current_Location_Group_Type as string,

		Current_Location_Group as string,

		Current_Ecomm_Open_Date as date,
		Ecomm_Type as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Merch_Program as string,

		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LocationTGT
source(output(
		Item_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Legacy_Item_Code as integer,
		Current_Legacy_Item_Code as integer,
		Variant_Id as integer,

		Current_Basket_Type as string,

		Current_Sell_Units as double,

		Current_Amp_Forecast_Item as string,
		Repack_Flag as string,
		Current_Repack_Flag as string,
		Last_Week_Ad_Type as string,
		Current_Last_Week_Ad_Type as string,
		Store_Report as string,
		Current_Store_Report as string,
		Department_Id as integer,
		Current_Department_Id as integer,
		Department_Name as string,
		Current_Department_Name as string,
		Merch_Department_Id as integer,
		Current_Merch_Department_Id as integer,
		Merch_Department as string,
		Current_Merch_Department as string,
		GL_Department_Id as integer,
		Current_GL_Department_Id as integer,
		GL_Department_Name as string,
		Current_GL_Department_Name as string,
		Cons_GL_Department_Id as integer,
		Current_Cons_GL_Department_Id as integer,
		Cons_GL_Department as string,
		Current_Cons_GL_Department as string,
		Cons_GL_Department_Name as string,
		Current_Cons_GL_Department_Name as string,
		Cons_Department as string,
		Current_Cons_Department as string,
		High_Level_Department as string,
		Current_High_Level_Department as string,
		Class_Cat_Id as integer,
		Current_Class_Cat_Id as integer,
		Class_Cat as string,
		Current_Class_Cat as string,
		Category_Id as integer,
		Current_Category_Id as integer,
		Category as string,
		Current_Category as string,
		New_Class as string,
		Current_Cnew_Class as string,
		New_Class_Category as string,
		Current_New_Class_Category as string,
		New_Class_Subcategory as string,
		Current_New_Class_Subcategory as string,
		Family_Code as string,
		Current_Family_Code as string,
		Family_Name as string,
		Current_Family_Name as string,
		Family_Id as integer,
		Current_Family_Id as integer,
		Family as string,
		Current_Family as string,
		Vendor_Id as string,
		Current_Vendor_Id as string,
		Brand_Name as string,
		Current_Brand_Name as string,
		AP_Vendor_Id as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_Id as string,
		AP_Vendor_Name as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_Name as string,
		AP_Vendor as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor as string,
		AP_Vendor_Address_Line_1 as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_Address_Line_1 as string,
		AP_Vendor_Address_Line_2 as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_Address_Line_2 as string,
		AP_Vendor_City as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_City as string,
		AP_Vendor_Province as string,
		Current_AP_Vendor_Province as string,
		Corp_Brand_Description as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Description as string,
		Corp_Brand_Short_Description as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Short_Description as string,
		Corp_Brand_Indicator as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Indicator as string,
		Corp_Brand_Variant_Code as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Variant_Code as string,
		Corp_Brand_Shield as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Shield as string,
		Corp_Brand_Variant as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Variant as string,
		Corp_Brand_Variant_Name as string,
		Current_Corp_Brand_Variant_Name as string,
		Daymon as string,
		Current_Daymon as string,
		Merchandiser_Name as string,
		Current_Merchandiser_Name as string,
		Merchandiser_Number as string,
		Current_Merchandiser_Number as string,
		Merchandiser as string,
		Current_Merchandiser as string,
		SCPM as string,
		Current_SCPM as string,
		General_Manager as string,
		Current_General_Manager as string,
		Vice_President as string,
		Current_Vice_President as string,
		CB_Director as string,
		Current_CB_Director as string,
		Business_Development_Manager as string,
		Current_Business_Development_Manager as string,
		Listing_Date as date,
		Current_Listing_Date as date,
		Discontinue_Date as string,
		Current_Discontinue_Date as string,
		Discontinue_Reason as string,
		Current_Discontinue_Reason as string,
		Family_Start_Date as date,
		Current_Family_Start_Date as date,
		Family_End_Date as date,
		Current_Family_End_Date as date,
		Source_System_Code as string,
		Current_Source_System_Code as string,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ItemTGT
RetailKnownShrinkSRC, FilterLocationActive join(LOCATION_ID == ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFactLocation
JoinFactLocation, FilterItemActive join(ITEM_ID == ItemTGT@ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFactLocationItem
JoinFactLocationItem derive(o_TX_DATE = toDate(TX_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumnDate
LocationTGT filter(IsActive == 1) ~> FilterLocationActive
ItemTGT filter(IsActive == 1) ~> FilterItemActive
DerivedColumnDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Transaction_Date as date,
		Location_Surrogate_Id as long,
		Item_Surrogate_Id as long,
		Scan_Code_Id as long,
		Shrink_Reason as string,
		Disposal_Method as string,
		Recall_Number as integer,
		Shrink_Units as double,
		Shrink_Cost as double,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as integer
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		Transaction_Date = o_TX_DATE,
		Location_Surrogate_Id,
		Item_Surrogate_Id,
		Scan_Code_Id = SCAN_CODE_ID,
		Shrink_Reason = SHRINK_REASON,
		Disposal_Method = DISPOSAL_METHOD,
		Recall_Number = RECALL_NUMBER,
		Shrink_Units = SHRINK_UNITS,
		Shrink_Cost = SHRINK_COST,
		Last_Changed = RetailKnownShrinkSRC@LAST_CHANGED,
		Last_Dml = RetailKnownShrinkSRC@LAST_DML
	)) ~> sinkTGT
